name: SalesforceInbox

methods.name: shareActivity
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ActivitySharingResult shareActivity(String activityId, ConnectApi.ActivitySharingInput sharingInfo)
methods.description: Share emails or events with certain groups of users.

params.name: sharingInfo
params.description: The ID of the activity. A ConnectApi.ActivitySharingInput object.

description: Access information about Automated Activity Capture, which is available in Einstein and Salesforce Inbox.
